vstore.framework.communication.download.threads

Class ThumbnailDownloadThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • vstore.framework.communication.download.threads.ThumbnailDownloadThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class ThumbnailDownloadThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    A simple thread for handling the download of a thumbnail of a file.

        public ThumbnailDownloadThread(java.lang.String fileUuid,
                               NodeInfo node,
                               java.io.File targetDirectory)
                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        fileUuid - The identifier of the file for which a thumbnail should be downloaded.
        node - The NodeInfo object of the node to download the file thumbnail from.
        targetDirectory - The target directory where to save the data.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - in case of an error.
